name: Morozko
description:
Hello! 

This is a game I made as a 2D games final with Korben Dennis, and Andy Yuan.

All in game controls are created with an Xbox or Logitech controller in mind. You can play this game with a keyboard, but the controls are not as streamlined.

-----------------  CONTROLS  -----------------  

LEVEL ONE:

Move  - Arrow Keys

Jump - Space Bar

LEVEL TWO:

F - Show Halo 

Z - Rotate Counter-Clockwise

X - Rotate Clockwise

A - Hold to Grow Ice Bridge

Y - Continue To Next Level

WARNING: This game has a bug in level two where the animation flashes, I am working to resolve it, but for the time being: if you are sensitive to flashing lights please do not play this game.
